name: Pixel Runner (DogSeeker)
description:
A very very very normal platformer game with a very very very normal story
And a very very very very very normal developer mental health.

=Pixel jumping game= "Z, X, C, V" to use the abilities. "Spacebar, Up Arrow, Left Click" to jump.

There is a secret you can explore, whatever key or click. Also try spend playing until 50 years, there is the way to cheat it too, comment here for what you found.
